sections.heading: assault; testimony; corroboration not required
sections.text: The testimony of a person who is a victim of a sexual assault as defined in sections 28-319 to 28-320.01 shall not require corroboration.SourceLaws 1989, LB 443, ยง 1;Laws 2006, LB 1199, ยง 13.AnnotationsThe State is not required to corroborate a victim's
